FuncDef:
The recycle prefix command configures a device to recycle prefixes.
By default, prefixes are not recycled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a start prefix to be recycled.
The address is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X::X:X/M.

Specifies an end prefix to be recycled.
The address is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X::X:X/M.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a prefix is being used but no user is online, you can run the recycle prefix command to recycle the prefix.
Configuration Impact
If the prefix is being used and there are online users, running this command may cause the users to get offline temporarily.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command can be run only in the delegation prefix pool view.
